A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I've never done a movie review but I cannot let all these seemingly fabricated positive reviews not be countered. 

I don't wish the actors of this movie any ill will. But this movie was hugely disappointing to say the least. I can't begin to list out the many reasons why. 

But I can summarize by saying that I was glad when the movie ended and my disappointment led to annoyance led to anger at the writer/director of this movie. Plot was extremely weak and left me with no desire to ever see another Star Wars movie sequel in the future (but of course as a nerd\, I will anyway... and will hate myself for it)
